meanings.definition: The quality of being willing to do favors or help others.
meanings.sent1: Her obligingnesses were evident when she offered to help her neighbor carry groceries.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your obligingnesses in assisting me with my project.
meanings.sent3: His obligingnesses knew no bounds, even offering to walk the neighbor's dog in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The obligingnesses of the community shone through as everyone pitched in to clean up after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The obligingnesses of the volunteers made the event run smoothly and efficiently.

meanings.definition: Acts of kindness or helpfulness towards others.
meanings.sent1: The obligingnesses of the staff at the shelter made the residents feel cared for.
meanings.sent2: Random acts of obligingnesses can brighten someone's day unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: The obligingnesses of the waiter went above and beyond, even juggling plates to entertain the customers.
meanings.sent4: Her obligingnesses were like a warm blanket on a cold day, comforting and reassuring.
meanings.sent5: The obligingnesses of the stranger who helped carry her bags left a lasting impression of kindness.
